title: Segmentation fault while training
body_html:
Issue description

Training crashes with segmentation fault at random points. When I restart the job from the saved checkpoint, doesn't crash at least for some time.
Here's the stacktrace.

[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] Signal: Segmentation fault (11)
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] Signal code: Address not mapped (1)
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] Failing at address: 0x8
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 0] /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(+0x11390)[0x7f10b1ef9390]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 1] python3[0x5810f8]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 2] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(_ZN5torch17PyObjectFinalizerD0Ev+0x32)[0x7f10a6fc1202]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 3] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so(THStorage_free+0x38)[0x7f109f2320c8]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 4] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so(THTensor_free+0x2f)[0x7f109f2d17df]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 5] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so(_ZN2at14CPUFloatTensorD0Ev+0x9)[0x7f109f114679]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 6] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(_ZN5torch8autograd8Variable4ImplD1Ev+0x291)[0x7f10a733e411]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 7] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(_ZN5torch8autograd8Variable4ImplD0Ev+0x9)[0x7f10a733e589]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 8] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(+0x777989)[0x7f10a7357989]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 9] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(+0x777a34)[0x7f10a7357a34]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [10] python3[0x58117a]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [11] python3[0x5b958b]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [12] python3[0x57fa8a]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [13] python3(PyEval_EvalFrameEx+0x4f2f)[0x53bc0f]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [14] python3(PyEval_EvalCodeEx+0x13b)[0x540f9b]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [15] python3[0x4ebe37]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [16] python3(PyObject_Call+0x47)[0x5c1797]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [17] python3(PyEval_EvalFrameEx+0x252b)[0x53920b]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [18] python3(PyEval_EvalFrameEx+0x4b04)[0x53b7e4]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [19] python3(PyEval_EvalFrameEx+0x4b04)[0x53b7e4]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [20] python3(PyEval_EvalCodeEx+0x13b)[0x540f9b]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [21] python3[0x4ebd23]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [22] python3(PyObject_Call+0x47)[0x5c1797]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [23] python3[0x4fb9ce]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [24] python3(PyObject_Call+0x47)[0x5c1797]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [25] python3(PyEval_CallObjectWithKeywords+0x30)[0x534d90]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [26] python3[0x609c02]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [27] /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(+0x76ba)[0x7f10b1eef6ba]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [28] /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(clone+0x6d)[0x7f10b1c2541d]

Code example

I'm running this example of Horovod Resnet50 Imagenet: https://github.com/uber/horovod/blob/master/examples/pytorch_imagenet_resnet50.py

PyTorch version: 0.4.1
Is debug build: No

/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/libcudnn.so.6.0.21

Training crashes with segmentation fault at random points. When I restart the job from the saved checkpoint, doesn't crash at least for some time.
Here's the stacktrace.
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] Signal: Segmentation fault (11)

body:
## Issue description

Training crashes with segmentation fault at random points. When I restart the job from the saved checkpoint, doesn't crash at least for some time.
Here's the stacktrace.
```
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] Signal: Segmentation fault (11)
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] Signal code: Address not mapped (1)
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] Failing at address: 0x8
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 0] /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(+0x11390)[0x7f10b1ef9390]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 1] python3[0x5810f8]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 2] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(_ZN5torch17PyObjectFinalizerD0Ev+0x32)[0x7f10a6fc1202]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 3] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so(THStorage_free+0x38)[0x7f109f2320c8]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 4] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so(THTensor_free+0x2f)[0x7f109f2d17df]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 5] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so(_ZN2at14CPUFloatTensorD0Ev+0x9)[0x7f109f114679]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 6] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(_ZN5torch8autograd8Variable4ImplD1Ev+0x291)[0x7f10a733e411]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 7] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(_ZN5torch8autograd8Variable4ImplD0Ev+0x9)[0x7f10a733e589]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 8] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(+0x777989)[0x7f10a7357989]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [ 9] /home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so(+0x777a34)[0x7f10a7357a34]

[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [14] python3(PyEval_EvalCodeEx+0x13b)[0x540f9b]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [15] python3[0x4ebe37]
[ip-172-31-77-112:61444] [16] python3(PyObject_Call+0x47)[0x5c1797]
```
